Material Details

Order an Americano at Stopbucks.

20.12.28

Display file name.pptx

Every year Underwood International College (UIC) brings together students from a diverse range of national and ethnic
backgrounds, providing them with a rigorous, world-class education through its innovative programs.
The admission process is designed to accommodate different educational systems and to support equality of opportunity.
An admissions committee reviews applications and comprehensively evaluates each prospective student.
While admission to UIC is competitive, UIC looks beyond the numbers and seeks applicants with global mindsets,
strong academic aspirations, and a spirit of dedication to community.
